thread.section_title: Flying Spares Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flying Spares | www.flyingspares.com
thread.title: David H
thread.title_full: Flying Spares reviewed by David H

author: David H
title: David H
text: I recently placed my first order with Flying Spares. Rolls - Royce parts are not all that easy to find here in the USA. Once I got familiar with their on - line catalogue, ordering was relatively simple. And the requested parts arrived in just a few days from their trip "over the pond" from the UK.
